website_summaries.verdict: For beginner to intermediate crafters and woodworkers, this saw handles smaller and lighter woods easily, but users may find blade changes frustrating.
pros: Cuts through hard woods easily, running smoothly with little vibration once properly bolted down
Makes precise, sharp cuts with good control
cons: Pinless blade adapter is clunky to use
Some reports of units not working on arrival or failing after a few uses
Air blower hose can pop off when cover is lifted

customer_reviews.title: just love it !
customer_reviews.text: found a bit difficult to adjust the right amount of pressure (I'm using a guitar tuner in order to adjust the tension on the saw, like piano strings I pinch them in order to get the same tune every time at same frequency)and right speed on the blade, broke few blade... but after few days of working with it I was able to cut very precise and fine cut in different wood for shadow theater. the machine doesn't vibrate and noise is very reasonable. the blade are easy to change and accept blade with and without pin end. the plate rotate witch allow you to make different angle cut. good quality after all for the price. 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Claude Jacquelin

customer_reviews.title: Used and returned by someone else
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a gift for my boyfriend's birthday, when he opened it yesterday after it was delivered, we realized that this scroll saw had been used and returned. There are several spots that have been worn and scuffed, looks like maybe a paint job was attempted on other spots. Nowhere on the description of the item does it state that it is used or refurbished. I'll be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Scroll Saw so I am not an expert and I am still getting used to working with it. The saw is well made and does a great job with very minimal vibration. The instructions are very good. My only concern at first was changing blades as the access to the blade holders is very limited. I found out if you remove the side panel (merely a dust cover with two screws holding it) the blade change is very simple as you now have good access to the lower blade holder.
customer_reviews.author: Dale A. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Nice scroll saw
customer_reviews.text: Nice saw for the money. Runs smoothly and well built. Although the light isn't blindingly bright, it is adequate for the job it is intended for. My only dislike is the adapter for pinless blades. Even after you get used to how to use it, it's still pretty clunky to use, especially when doing fretwork.
customer_reviews.author: shootingmans

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy saw
customer_reviews.text: I love this saw, especially for the price. I do wish it had a better way to attach universal (plain end) blades- I tried and tried but using the adapters is a ridiculous waste of time. I personally needed a saw that could also fit pin end blades for more heavy duty work- this saw is great other than the adapters
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works very well - no need to splurge on an A-brand.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well - no need to splurge on an A-brand, good price point for good quality. Used it for several pinewood derby cars. Hint: bolt it down to your workbench to eliminate vibrations.
customer_reviews.author: Ilse

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase even though I never heard the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase even though I never heard the name before. I took a big risk buying on line. This scroll saw performs perfectly. The only issue I had was a blown fuse and I couldnt figure out why it wasnt working. I called customer service and they knew right away what the issue was. problem resolved and customer service was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Lellis

customer_reviews.title: Blade changing is laborious
customer_reviews.text: the machine is good as compare to the performance. I will 3 stars as changing pinless blade is the most frustrating thing about this product. I will recommend shop fox to give butterfly screw for clamping pinless blades that will give some ease in using pinless blades... The scroll saws... blade changing mechanism is the major decisive factor...
customer_reviews.author: Mamoon

customer_reviews.title: Not much quality control from factory
customer_reviews.text: First. I'm. New user of this type of saw. When I received the saw the blade was included and installed. Using this saw was very difficult. It kept picking up my work; very dangerous. . No manual was included. But after checking on YouTube I realized the blade was wrong. It had been installed upside down from the factory. This should never happen on a dangerous piece of equipment. Poor inspection guys!!
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Machine shakes when cutting
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job, but you need to really control the wood as it vibrates alot. The circle in the middle where the blade is has an indentation. When I try to use small pieces of wood and come to the end of the circle part, i have to lift the piece of wood up in order to continue. When I do this many times the wood jerks dislodges. I think the circle part needs a metal plate so that the circle part would be flat and I wouldn't have this problem. I would not recommend this product because of these factors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. I have been wanting one for a while but thought I wanted a larger more expensive version. This one does everything I need at a far lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Quaif

customer_reviews.title: Quality out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, BUT the motor won't turn. The arms will move easily by hand, Even with the motor on, it won't take over when the arms are moved by hand. This one is going back.
customer_reviews.author: John of WV

customer_reviews.title: Shop Fox W1713 16-Inch Variable Speed Scroll Saw
customer_reviews.text: Is good for the price. There are a few drawbacks but overall is good for a starter scroll saw.. I did purchase the saw to replace one lost in a fire. I do recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fox Scroll Saw
customer_reviews.text: Great saw for crafts and detail work, great investment. Blades were a little difficult to find locally, then Holidays arrived, & local retailers started handling various blades for this saw.
customer_reviews.author: oldfox

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron.
customer_reviews.text: I like this, cast iron, heavy construction for a reasonably priced say. I originally ordered the Wen and it arrived with cracked table and connection that's pictured on another review for it. Sent it back (Prime, no issues at all) and ordered this one. Very impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz from the Branch

customer_reviews.title: great little machine
customer_reviews.text: When updating my old Craftsman, I researched many models of scroll saws. For the best bang for the buck, this machine is head and shoulders above the rest. It was interesting that the cast base of my 25 year old machine is the same as this new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I bought this machine not knowing exactly what to expect ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine not knowing exactly what to expect but that quickly changed when I tried it out for the first time! It was a breeze to operate! Came with 2 blades and blade change was surprisingly quick! Haven't tried out the adapter for the headless blades yet though. Vibration was minimal... I did not secure it to the table, just rest it there :)
customer_reviews.author: N. Juman

customer_reviews.title: great cut.
customer_reviews.text: cuts great. I haven't broken a blade yet. some of the holddown knobs are a little flimsy. like the one that works the holddown foot. have to retighten it often. also the deck is a little wobbely also. The light isn't nearly as strong as it needs to be. but the main thing, the cut is superb. the frame is also heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Kayak

customer_reviews.title: Very nice saw
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for the limited use so far. Cuts clean and I had no problems changing blades over. The light on top was a very nice touch, however, one problem I noticed was when the cover was pulled up, the blower hose popped off a lot. Additionally, the board size adjustment was a little out of square so I have to take a couple of turns to get the adjustment correct but other than that, it works as advertised and I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: burd50

customer_reviews.title: 9 month saw!?
customer_reviews.text: Well, product initially did a great job, but after 9 months of use, the motor accelerates at a very high speed (above the product listed speed) and will not adjust. I could see this if the saw were in constant use, but not as it is used only occasionally. Apparently switch or motor has become defective. If you only want a saw to last a few months, go for it, it does work well for a few months, but I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: This little guy turned out great. Was worried and debating about purchasing the twice ...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy turned out great. Was worried and debating about purchasing the twice as expensive Dewalt. Couldn't be happier with this choice. The only change I made to it was to change the light bulb it came with for a LED one. But the cutting, speed, etc - all great - doesn't vibrate either. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Navrin

customer_reviews.title: Bad motor
customer_reviews.text: I used this for just about a week. I noticed the motor stuttered some times. Finally the motor just quit. I returned it and ended up getting a Dewalt - the highest rated saw (and more expensive) I’ve used the Dewalt for a few weeks so far without any complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Randall W Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pinless Useless
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scroll saw for pin blade ' s. I wouldn't depend on this model for pinless because the adapters don't hold too well and is time consuming setting up the adapters with pinless blades. Quality scroll saw for pin blade's, and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: GPM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed for such an inexpensive machine. Very low vibration, Quiet operation. Stable base. Easy adjustments and bladed changes. Enough power for most tasks. I added a power switch so that you could have the light turn on and the machine come up to the set speed without turning the variable speed knob and hitting the light switch. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Nice scroll saw, works well
customer_reviews.text: This scrolls saw is quite capable. The bellows air pump doesn't do much, and the front exiting vent is somewhat awkward, but the speed control is smooth and the machine works very well. I'm a newbie and I was able to cut out a cursive capital letter out of 1/8" plywood my first time.
customer_reviews.author: bzzh8c

customer_reviews.title: I love the saw itself and the way it works HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: I love the saw itself and the way it works HOWEVER....I've only used it for 2 weeks and a bolt in the gear mechanism has come loose and there are no instructions on how to remove the table and/or get to that area to fix it. I am in the middle of a huge project and am totally frustrated. Even You tube doesn't have the answer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SVA

customer_reviews.title: I can make it  like a pro
customer_reviews.text: Great for a woodworking novice like myself. Easy to use. The light is very helpful since my eye site isn't what it use to be. This scroll saw is very high quality for the money. I was extremely impressed. I look forward to many hours of wood crafting with this baby. Super happy with this purchase. Probably one of the best items I have ever purchased from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Moises Alonso

customer_reviews.title: I used my friends saw and fall in love with the process
customer_reviews.text: I am a new scroll saw converter. I used my friends saw and fall in love with the process. I must admit, I was nervous using this at first. However, its a lot easier than I thought. The light is very helpful to see the wood. Having the safety feature also helps a lot as I'm not very good at pushing the wood through just yet. the weight of the machine is also good as the machine does not move as much when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Delzen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Metal construction
customer_reviews.text: Bought this scrollsaw with low expectations with it being an offshore production thing, but Im totally impressed. This saw is overbuilt, in a good way. Cast iron everywhere, and a metal body, with easy access for the motor brushes. I can run this saw full speed and balance a nickel on the platen. Pretty happy with it, cheaper than Delta, but just as stable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY!!
customer_reviews.text: I received My Shop Fox scroll saw in good shape and machine looks to be of good quality. When I set the saw up on my bench without bolting it down, it did have some vibration. After bolting it down, no vibration! It passed the nickel test. Do yourself a favor and buy some good scroll saw blades, this will help quite a bit! I did a lot of research, I chose this one. I AM VERY HAPPY WITH THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: ... saw ( I purchased it new) allowed me to easily use a 3/32 blade through a 3/16 holed
customer_reviews.text: My 1960's Rockwell jig saw ( I purchased it new) allowed me to easily use a 3/32 blade through a 3/16 holed. I had to align vertical each time but that was not a big deal. It is a real challenge to do so with this new saw. I have designed a clamp to hold the bottom end of the blade in position while threading the top through the small hole. This feature was why selected this saw as it stated it was one of the features of this saw..
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence H Pleau

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the saw. I've had it now for about 6 months and have completed several projects with it and the saw has performed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Frank F.

customer_reviews.title: Scroll saw
customer_reviews.text: I have a small wood work shop where I work on small projects. They are called automata which is a craft/art object (mine are based on machines) that are sort of like Rube Goldberg objects. This saw is invaluable for sharp cuts. I find the blade easy to change out. The unit impresses me as being sound and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zapped

customer_reviews.title: Updated to 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out on this one. I am unable to square the blade to the table. The table would have to tilt to a negative degree in order to square it to the blade unless there is something else I haven't tried. Otherwise I think it would be good but a square cut is essential. I'll have to return unless I can get it squared up. If anyone knows what to try please let me know. Now after having a little more time, I have squared the blade and it's working perfectly. It'll be more than good for hobbywork.
customer_reviews.author: Mysell

customer_reviews.title: I have had it for a month or so now and it was very easy to learn on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not knowing anything about scroll saws but i have done a lot of woodworking using other tools. I have had it for a month or so now and it was very easy to learn on. The blade changes are not difficult if you know what you are doing. I have made several different projects using this. It doesn't really shake and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I must say I am very disappointed in the blade set-up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the W1713 from amazon on 2/24/2018. This is the first I have used it since I bought it. I must say I am very disappointed in the blade set-up! It is very awkward and cumbersome, and the blade drops off when you do interior work. My old saw held the blade in place at the bottom. This saw the blade fell into the machine. Very frustrating. Just add this to your review’s.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pethick

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with saw
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with saw. I have cut out several pieces and it works good. Even used it on a card table and it worked well. Need to mount it / bolt it down and it will be great. Worth the money. Set up was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dick

customer_reviews.title: pinless blade disaster
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price.runs smooth..good power.the major issue is use of pinless blades.the adaptor is poor and difficult to mount on the machine.this is a major pain. i would spend another few dollars and move up to a machine with better pinless blade system. if you don't use pinless this is a good tool.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Biscan

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It is a very good
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is a very good, mid-level scroll saw. A little tough on the hard woods, but the variable speed can get it going pretty fast so that hard woods are not that much of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Light is way too dim. Hold down shoe awkward and near impossible to set flush to the wood. Blade guard does not adequately clear hold down shoe due to poor design or poor manufacturing. Changing blades is PITA. Besides all that maybe it is a good saw?
customer_reviews.author: YRNCOUNTING

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Already paid for itself!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy packs a punch! 1/8 HP gets the job done. The blade that it comes with even lasted me through a ton of plywood. The insert around the blade has a piece of plastic that isn't 100% flush with the table. Little sandpaper fixed it right up though.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Very quite and power is good. Double boxed arrived in great shape only damage ...
customer_reviews.text: This saw is everything I hoped it would be for the price. Very quite and power is good. Double boxed arrived in great shape only damage was the light bulb and I cannot find a replacement anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie davison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent produce just what it said it was an works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good price. I use it to introduce my son ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. good price. I use it to introduce my son into woodworking
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine, poor light
customer_reviews.text: Good machine, light is a joke. Can't find an LED replacement bulb that will fit so I'm adding different lights.
customer_reviews.author: Kiowa EM

customer_reviews.title: Great 'little' Scroll saw
customer_reviews.text: Great 'little' Scroll saw. If I had it to do over, I probably would have spent more for one larger. But, a starter saw to learn on this machine works well.
customer_reviews.author: kirk nafsinger

customer_reviews.title: Good saw
customer_reviews.text: Good saw. Mine was refurbished with a dent in the end but working well. Nice cast table. Be sure to get replacement lightbulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Claremont Guy

customer_reviews.title: Blade adapters too cumbersome to install painless blades.
customer_reviews.text: Bought item because it would accept pinless blades, but the adapters for pinless blades were too cumbersome. I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changing blades is a real chore.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a beginners saw because it will show you almost all the things that you do not want with a scroll saw. I also think I'm being generous with a three star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly well, but the piece that holds the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well, but the piece that holds the wood in place will not stay tight and the air blower is not strong enough to keep the dust cleared away from the cutting line.
customer_reviews.author: Louella Ackley

customer_reviews.title: Great Scroll Saw
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this scroll saw. Its perfect in size and just as powerful as the other high dollar saws as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Harris

customer_reviews.title: So far it works
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, easy setup. Only thing I wish it had was and on and off switch versus it being connected to the speed dial.
customer_reviews.author: Swope

customer_reviews.title: not very good. insert too thin and dust collection in front ...
customer_reviews.text: not very good. insert too thin and dust collection in front makes it hard to get up close. also hard to change blades.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my daughter, has only been used twice in a little over a year, used it a 3rd time over the weekend and it quit working all together! Not sure who to contact, but we have not owned it for 2 years and I do believe there is a 2 year warranty, hope so!
customer_reviews.author: Emilee McNeilan

customer_reviews.title: Scroll Saw a FOX!!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is a wonderful scroll saw. It's fast and easy to operate , really like the adjustable speeds it has and a pleasure to operate. I spend hours in my work shop using this Saw. Set-up is working ok. It's fast to set up and change to whatever needs you may have up to a certain point of course.
customer_reviews.author: James Carlile

customer_reviews.title: Great little saw!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little saw... Perfect for the pattern and sign work I'm doing. Smooth quiet action, yet portable. We'll see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Billings

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good seller.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for her crafting projects and she loves it. Solid, works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It's a Shop Fox!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Shop Fox products. I bought this scroll saw primarily for my granddaughter but I know we will both get our money's worth. It's heavy and works great. Love Shop Fox.
customer_reviews.author: clip721

customer_reviews.title: I have used others and have been disappointed. The variable speed is great
customer_reviews.text: This machine really does the job. I have used others and have been disappointed. The variable speed is great. A lot of fun. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: excellant
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of reviews and for the money I chose the ShopFox. It had been years since I used a scroll saw. I am a professional furniture maker and needed a machine that would meet all my demands. Right out of the box I cut asian patterns through 3/4 quarter-sawn white oak. Great machine and no vibration.
customer_reviews.author: robert J.

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to operate & I replaced a 20" brand "X" ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid tool. It is easy to operate & I replaced a 20" brand "X" with it. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: John Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry-level saw.
customer_reviews.text: The only fault I have with this saw is that the table is painted. Other than that, it works great. Nice finish on all surfaces. Saw is working fine for this beginning scroller.
customer_reviews.author: M. Atencio

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad tool just wish they would have added the quick ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad tool just wish they would have added the quick discontent for the blades. I have been unable to find them anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little saw
customer_reviews.text: Great little saw, quiet and real steady. Light and blower are positioned perfect. I would buy 100 times over if I needed that many.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My small hobby shop
customer_reviews.text: After recently moving to a smaller home, I wanted to buy woodworking machines for my smaller garage. I stopped making larger objects like furniture for smaller toys. I made a few puzzles for my grand children on my new scroll saw and it works better than I expected. No broken blades and nice clean cuts. I mounted it on my work bench for stability. This is a good solid machine!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent scroll saw that is well made for any job requiring precision cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest E. Logan

customer_reviews.title: See below comments.
customer_reviews.text: Good saw---used it to cut out 7 racks for display of shotguns Have not yet even had to change the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest J. Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works very well for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Wedge Turner

customer_reviews.title: I like this Scroll saw as its fairly stable and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this Scroll saw as its fairly stable and easy to use so far. I have one issue though and that is my variable speed control does not work right. I have to turn the knob more than half way to even get the blade to move. 7/24/16 update The variable speed switch ceased to function and now it just hums at me. Time for a new one but not sure I will go Back to Shop Fox as I don't trust the quality. I might have gotten a bad one since others seem to have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed using the scroll saw
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using the scroll saw, only wish I was more experienced and wish it was easier to remove and install a pinless blade when doing intricate work that is done by drilling holes in the wood. Frank Reed
customer_reviews.author: RUTH REED

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. I will be upgrading soon but this had definitely served it purpose and I have more than made my money back from it worth it if you have a tight budget and don't need to do a ton of inside work. This has been my first scroll saw and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine M.

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband. He reports that is quiet, relatively vibration free, easy to set up and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: The Shop Fox scroll saw came double-boxed, so there was no damage in shipping. I bought this saw because of the price and because it has a cast iron table, instead of aluminum. Also, it uses blades with or without pins. I have had absolutely no problems with it. I was surprised that it even came with a light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little saw
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little saw. If your looking for a high end machine then you need to spend a lot more money. But if your looking for a great beggining saw that will take you into the intermediate level at a good price this is the saw.
customer_reviews.author: Randy R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected from a scroll saw at this price point
customer_reviews.author: Greekbeak

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is not a high end scroll saw. Attaching and removing pinless blades is a little clumsy. There is very little vibration, but more than the higher-end saws costing 5x as much. For the price, this is a great little scroll saw, completely meeting my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Boycotting Shop Fox
customer_reviews.text: I was using an almost new unit when it went SPROING and ceased working. I contacted Shop Fox who told me in no specific order that 1) they did NOT have any service facilities 2) they didn't know where I could get service and 3) they couldn't help me figure out what broke. Although I am a pretty good woodaholic I'm a horrible mechanic. The Wen I then bought isn't as good of a tool but at least it functions. No more Shop Fox products shall enter my workshop.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carmody

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its ok just hard changing the pin less blades make for slow project cutting
customer_reviews.author: Neil Helton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice saw, very little vibration. I have cut 3/4'' oak with no problem (with any kinda saw or wood let the blade cut don't force it) comes with 2 blades. I have only used pin blades and there easy to Install. I chose this saw because it don't look cheep like a lot of other scroll saws. Amazon was the cheapest I have seen this saw.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: I am a little disappointed in the way the pinless blades are installed
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the purchase it was supposed to haavee a 4 mm T Wrench with it. It was not in the supplies. I am a little disappointed in the way the pinless blades are installed, but I have a huge supple opf epinless blades and like to use them. I will install the pinless blade. I like the solid feeling it has. I have not used it yet on a project to really report on it. I would like a T handle 4 mm hex wrench.forwarded to me
customer_reviews.author: Steve Conway

customer_reviews.title: Blade changer for plain end is not very good and dust pick up is very bad and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Blade changer for plain end is not very good and dust pick up is very bad and the blower works slow cuts good and varible rate is good for a new scroll saw user I wished I had checked ou all befor buying . I purchased a blade adaptet to use plain ends I t will last for awhile
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Cubberly

customer_reviews.title: I was astounded at how good this scroll saw is
customer_reviews.text: I was astounded at how good this scroll saw is. I did not like the adaptor to use flat blades but the pin blades are doing the jobs I need so this is minor. When the blade is turned to side cut the blower nozzle is not where it is most effective I used a small piece of plastic tubing to take care of that
customer_reviews.author: Roy D-H

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine, but the wood stabilizer is a little tricky to secure and is off angle a bit. Other than that its a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Many parts that are poor quality and break
customer_reviews.text: Many parts that are poor quality and break. Machine bounces so bad no cut is good. Threw it out and went to Lowes and got a great scroll saw--same functions with solid performance.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha King

customer_reviews.title: Quality scroll saw
customer_reviews.text: Saw has power, and is relatively quiet. I haven't compared it to other current scroll saws, but it is a lot quieter than the old vibrator-type I used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Video-Don

customer_reviews.title: and is a very good value. My main complaint is that the adapter ...
customer_reviews.text: This saw works well, and is a very good value. My main complaint is that the adapter setup for using plain-end blades is very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Walter L. Wien

customer_reviews.title: I will give a good review after I've used it awhile
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and ued it a few times, I will give a good review after I've used it awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: Not packaged adequately for shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this Jan 05,2012 received Jan 12, 2012. OUTSIDE=No damage to either the shipping box nor the "re-taped" Mfg's box. INSIDE = styrofoam broken up, Dust port (vac' hose) broken off laying loose in the styrofoam. Reported it "damaged due to inappropriate packaging". The damage to the styrofoam surrounding the machine & the re-taped mfg's box led me to believe this may have been opened and returned in the past. Returned it Jan 13, 2012. Requested a refund. 2 stars removed for the apparent poor mfg's packing, re-taping of the mfg's box and the hassle of having to return it instead of using it today.
customer_reviews.author: Sedonartist

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: My first scroll saw, I liked the easy setup and easy operation. Works great
customer_reviews.author: D Long

customer_reviews.title: A cut above most :-)
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Easy to change blades. I'm glad I bought this and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Warner

customer_reviews.title: My first scroll saw...
customer_reviews.text: My first scroll saw...the shop fox was easy to use and set up. Making decorative brackets out of inch and a quarter poplar was easy enough with the shop fox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality was poor. The blade did not operate in a vertical plane so every cut was ragged. I will replace this saw with a more expensive higher quality saw.
customer_reviews.author: Mack McCluskey

customer_reviews.title: Shop Fox W1713 16" variable speed scroll saw
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in good condition, works well and fits my needs. Did have a little trouble finding additonal blades for my needs, but no reflection on the saw.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Agree:  Easy blade change? Total Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the saw does not work for pinless blades. DO NOT BUY THIS SAW IF YOU WANT TO USE PINLESS BLADES. It is good value for pin blades I imagine but don't any comparison. It seems to work ok. However, as the other reviewer "den" puts it in detail it is not acceptable as a saw that will use pinless blades. Buy at your own risk. I was a newby and broke so was looking for a deal not realizing what was important. The ability to change pinless blades is important. I've broken several just now and still can't get a pinless blade attached and threaded through a small piece of wood.
customer_reviews.author: overthetopboys

customer_reviews.title: This didn't come in the original box and didn't include ...
customer_reviews.text: This didn't come in the original box and didn't include a manual. When set up I realized there were bolts missing and the motor wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fox scroll saw from america
customer_reviews.text: The machine itself is fine but it would have been helpful to know that it was made and being dispatched from America. Consequently I had to source a step up transformer resulting in extra cost and more delay etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mike West

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times. I have no complaints. Strong motor and the base and table are very solid. It would be nice if they put a bright LED light in instead of the dim incandescent. Other than that, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: ... at some speeds but other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Shakes a little at some speeds but other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: cg

product_meta.title: Shop Fox W1713 16-Inch Variable Speed Scroll Saw
product_meta.description: Variable speed control, extra cutting capacity and cast iron construction are the features most sought after in a Scroll Saw. The Shop Fox Scroll Saw also offers a gooseneck work light, dust blower and dust port, large 45-degree tilt table and easy blade changes.
feature_bullets: Includes a gooseneck work light, dust blower and dust port
